rewardsTooltip: Your rewards balance is automatically converted into your staked balance.
noStake: You have not deposited ethereum yet
noActivities: You have not performed any activities yet

getFaucetErrorMessages.addressHasAlready: Your wallet has already received ETH
getFaucetErrorMessages.userIpHasAlready: Your Ip has already received ETH

withdrawCardsType.tooltipPool: Withdrawals from the Pool remain in the Smart Contract and are processed instantly.
withdrawCardsType.tooltipBeaconChain: Validator withdrawals stay in the Beacon Chain and are processed by Stake Together's oracles according to the Beacon Chain queue and take a minimum of 1 day to process.

airdrop.infoEnter: Enter and verify if you have incentives to receive

incentives.poolDescription: 50% of the Incentives are allocated for having a project in Stake Together
incentives.socialDescription: 10% of the Incentives are allocated for making deposits in social impact projects
incentives.earlyDescription: 20% of the Incentives from the first 3 months are allocated for people who make deposits in the first month
incentives.giftsDescription: 20% of the Incentives are allocated for sending gifts for people who have a staked and Stake Together App installed

invest.title: Invest with Projects
invest.description: Invest in ethereum staking, support projects, and earn rewards together

deposit.title: Deposit Ether
deposit.description: Deposit ETH to earn staking rewards with stpETH while boosting incentives for this project

incentives.title: Incentives
incentives.description: Weekly incentives in Ethereum in Stake (stpETH) are sent through the perpetual airdrop to supporters and users.

gifts.title: Projects' Gifts
gifts.description: Receive gifts in stpETH from your favorite projects, ranging from a small coffee or a free lunch to international trips.

stake.description: Invest in Ethereum with the projectName project using Stake Together and maximize your profits while supporting your favorite projects through the Blockchain.

stake.apyTooltip: Annual Percentage Yield represents the depositor's investment return over one year, considering auto-reinvestment and compound interest. (APY)
stake.tvlTooltip: Total Invested with the Project refers to the total amount of ETH deposited into the project. The more ETH, the greater the incentives for project. (Project TVL)
stake.rewardsTooltip: Rewards generated by incentives by stakers in this project
stake.faucetTooltip: Try the protocol, get Goerli Ethereum here

descriptionForm.receiveTooltip: When you deposit ETH, you receive the stpETH token in return. The stpETH receives staking rewards daily.
descriptionForm.exchangeTooltip: Exchange is the equivalence between ETH and stpETH.
descriptionForm.rewardsTooltip: The Future Rewards Rate is the rate deducted from future staking rewards based on the annual deposited amount.
descriptionForm.operationTooltip: Operation Fee is the fee that is deducted from the deposit.

coffee.title: Coffee
coffee.description: Start your day happy with a delicious coffee.

gifts.titleOfAccount: Enter your account to verify your gifts
gifts.notGift: You haven't received any gifts yet
